name: Solitaire (itch) (Matteo Graizzaro)
description:
Minimal Solitaire I developed to step out of my comfort zone.

Game Features
  • Klondike Solitaire
  • Draw 3 mode
  • Relaxing and simple aesthetic

Source code on Github: https://github.com/Vacui/Solitaire

Credits

More about the assets used on the Github page.

Contacts

If you need help or report a bug, you can use this platform or contacting me on Twitter or by e-mail. You can also review my Linkedin profile, to get more info about my background.
